title: Spicer's Out, Scaramucci's In and Kushner Speaks: A Closer Look | Fred Savage
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump's most recent attacks on the Russia investigation, his secret health care bill and his communications staff shake-up. (0:20)
Then, Fred Savage explains to Seth why he doesn't hang out with his co-stars after filming and reveals what he's actually doing when everyone else is out on the town. (12:08)
Finally, Savage sticks around backstage to answer a few more questions from Late Night producer Henry Melcher. (19:34)
